name: Enzyklopedia Kuriosica
description:
Enzyklopedia Kuriosica is a short Prototype-Text-Adventure for a dialogue system, where the dialogue partner answers to you emotionally and reacts significantly different to the questions you could ask her. 

Understandable that a re-run offers itself :).

P.S.: This could be helpful -> http://enzyklopediakuriosica.tumblr.com
